sourcesContent:
import { useState } from "react" export default function SavingsForm(props){ const [currentSavings,setCurrentSavings]=useState(0); const [yearlySavings,setYearlySavings]=useState(0); const [expectedInterest,setExpectedInterest]=useState(0); const [investmentDuration, setInvestmentDuration]=useState(0); const userInput={ 'current-savings':currentSavings, 'yearly-contribution':yearlySavings, 'expected-return':expectedInterest, 'duration':investmentDuration } console.log(userInput) return(
props.onCalculateClick(e)}>

setCurrentSavings(e.target.value)} type="number" id="current-savings" />

setYearlySavings(e.target.value)} type="number" id="yearly-contribution" />

setExpectedInterest(e.target.value)} type="number" id="expected-return" />

setInvestmentDuration(e.target.value)} type="number" id="duration" />

) }
